column1: Uchi////My favorite was the sake namida (which unfortunately I wasn't able to get a picture of - as we devoured it immediately). I ordered the hot rock and the sake salmon sashimi which was phenomenal. The only thing I could possibly say that wasn't all that wonderful
column2: was probably that the hot rock wasn't hot enough to cook my meat
column3: but as soon there was mention of it
column4: it was immediately replaced. So all is well.
